query:
-- Insertar o actualizar stock para Laptop HP Pavilion (productId=1, userId=1)
INSERT INTO inventory (userId, productId, stock, lastRestockDate, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (1, 1, 5, NOW(), NOW(), NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE 
  stock = 5,
  lastRestockDate = NOW(),
  updatedAt = NOW();
